data.name: Idle Baker Boss
data.detailed_description:
Grow your franchise and manage a bakery in Idle Baker Boss, a new idle game. Unlock over 150 recipes from cookies, muffins and donuts to extravagant cakes and pies.

Gain coins and sell your store to grow your tycoon empire. Gifts allow you to unlock special rare recipes which you can sell for higher profits. You can bake common, Tasty (uncommon), Yummy (rare), Decadent (epic) and Exquisite (legendary) desserts. Display your baked goods for sale in special display cases to increase your profits.

Hire bakers, cashiers and managers to run your bakery and let it run idle while you are offline making you coins and gems while are you away and become a true tycoon of the baking world.

Idle Baker Boss is great for casual gamers and fans of idle clicker games and appeals to those who like to maximize efficiency and profits. Bake your way to the top of the industry.

If you love to see numbers go up (NGU), are a fan of idle games or incremental games and cute desserts, this game is for you!

Features:

  • Over 150 desserts to collect
  • Periodic Events year round
  • Daily Challenges
  • Over 100 Awards to collect
  • Cute Desserts
  • Prestige / Ascension System.
  • Managers that earn you in game cash while you are away (Offline).
  • Inventory System with Display Cases
  • No Internet connection requirement
  • Different Franchise with unique recipes to unlock
  • Skill Tree system

data.short_description: Grow your bakery franchise and manage bakeries in this cute idle tycoon game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
